page.title: 17Scotch Corner Hotel-contd
page.content:
The hotel caters for foreign tourists as well as national and local visitors. It is also a busy local meeting place for local business men and farmers and also hosts many local social group functions which include dinners and dances for the locality. There is accommodation for 360 guests. The hotel is considered to be a part of the village community and employs a number of Middleton Tyas and other local people.
Like all similar busy hotels, the staff work long hours and much of the work can be physically tiring. Besides the bedroom accommodation the hotel contains restaurant and bar facilities which include the recently opened {Bedale Carvery.}
